==Trivia==
* <section begin="OminousFandangoLeitmotif" />The following soundtracks share a leitmotif:
** [[Ominous Fandango]]
** [[Floating World Under the Moonlight (Soundtrack)|Floating World Under the Moonlight]]
** [[Rhapsodia Roscida]]
** [[Quintempus Niteastetae]]
** [[Polumnia Omnia]]
** [[King Deshret and the Three Magi (Soundtrack)|King Deshret and the Three Magi]]
** [[Hyakuin of Blossoming Mirage]]
** [[Moment of Tribulation]]
** [[All in One, All in Vain]]
** [[Heart of Yuugen]]
** [[Novatio Novena]]
** [[Ashes of Anupadhisesa]]
** [[Polumnia Omnia (Performance Version)]]<section end="OminousFandangoLeitmotif" />
* Like many other aspects of [[Scaramouche]]'s character, the title "Ominous Fandango" is likely a reference to a line in the 1975 song "{{w|Bohemian Rhapsody}}" by British rock Orchestra {{w|Queen (Band)|Queen}}: "Scaramouche, scaramouche, will you do the fandango?"
